Michael Joubert bụ onye isi otu ụlọ ọrụ na Johannesburg Stock Exchange.[] Michael Joubert bụ onye ọchụnta ego mara mma nke akụrụngwa egwuregwu ụmụaka na ngalaba ihe eji arụ ụlọ na South Africa
Ọ rụrụ ụlọ ahịa ụlọ Zozo a ma ama
Ụlọ ọrụ bụ isi nke Mr
Joubert bụ 'Zozo' abụrụla aha a na-akpọkarị na South Africa na nkebi ahịrịokwu ahụ ụlọ zozo abanyela na usoro asụsụ South Africa

The Joubert's nwetara nlebara anya ọha mgbe Michael Joubert, dị ka a ihunanya mmegharị, zụtara nwunye ya otu puku ogologo stemmed Roses mgbe a mụsịrị nwa ha nke atọ, Adam na akụkọ ghọrọ n'ihu page ozi.[] Joubert na ezinụlọ ya si South Africa kwaga Canada na 1989
Michael Joubert nwụrụ n'ihi ọrịa strok n'afọ 2002.[]
